groupe.title: PRESENTATION OF SOGAT GROUP
groupe.description: SOGAT is a family-owned, independent group in its third generation, experiencing significant growth. With over 30 years of partnerships with major clients, the group serves a diverse international clientele across industries like railways, automotive, nuclear, and more. Renowned for its expertise and innovation, SOGAT leads in France with solutions such as retractable catenaries and aluminum cutting. The group boasts a skilled management team and an agile workforce, with an average age of 40, thriving in a positive work environment.

foundation.label: Year of creation of the first company (SOGAT = 1987)

departments.label: Specialized design offices in robotics, electrical, automation and mechanics

overview.title: SOGAT a family-owned, independent, historic and high-growth group
overview.subtitle: An economic model based on:
points: Portfolio of recurring key account customers, some of whom have been working with the group for over 30 years
Significant diversification of our clientele (Railway, automotive, nuclear, steel and aluminum, Food processing, Luxury, Pharmaceutical, Environment, etc.)
Recognized expertise and strong innovation capacity where we are leaders in France
Agile, flexible, experienced workforce with an average age of around 40 years
